actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint Resolution to amend the Constitution to provide for representation of the District of Columbia in the Congress.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that the District of Columbia be treated as a State for purposes of representation in the Congress, election of the President and Vice President, and Article V of the Constitution of the United States. Repeals the provisions of the twenty-third amendment to the Constitution of the United States.

titles.title: Joint Resolution to amend the Constitution to provide for representation of the District of Columbia in the Congress.
